TOOL.NAME: Computer Management
TOOL.HELP: View and configure system settings and components.

TOOL.NAME: System Information
TOOL.HELP: View advanced information about hardware and software settings.

TOOL.NAME: Programs
TOOL.HELP: Launch, add or remove programs and ReactOS components.

TOOL.NAME: System Properties
TOOL.HELP: View basic information about your computer system settings.

TOOL.NAME: Internet Protocol Configuration
TOOL.HELP: View and configure network address settings.

TOOL.NAME: Performance Monitor
TOOL.HELP: Monitor the performance of local or remote computers.

TOOL.NAME: Resource Monitor
TOOL.HELP: Monitor the performance and resource usage of the local computer.

TOOL.NAME: Task Manager
TOOL.HELP: View details about programs and processes running on your computer.

TOOL.NAME: Registry Editor
TOOL.HELP: Make changes to the ReactOS registry.

TOOL.NAME: Remote Assistance
TOOL.HELP: Receive help from (or offer help to) a friend over the Internet.

TOOL.NAME: System Restore
TOOL.HELP: Restore your computer system to an earlier state.
